from ncoop57_mages.core import Mage, Ability, Demon
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

init_player[source]

init_player()

Initializes a player, Mage, with the user's speciality and name

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
player = init_player()
print(player)

Hi there, what is your speciality? ['fire', 'water']
        Nathan's Current Health: 100
        Nathan's Max Health: 100
        Nathan's Ability Damage: 10
        Nathan's Ability Type: water
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

combat[source]

combat(player, boss)

Perform combat between a player, Mage, which was generated with the init_player, and a Demon

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
boss = Demon("Jerry", 30)
combat(player, boss)

Combat has begun!
        Nathan's Current Health: 100
        Nathan's Max Health: 100
        Nathan's Ability Damage: 10
        Nathan's Ability Type: water
        
        Jerry's Current Health: 30
        Jerry's Max Health: 30
        Jerry's Ability Damage: 10
        Jerry's Ability Type: fire

{% endraw %} {% raw %}

game_loop[source]

game_loop(player, n=5)

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
player = init_player()
game_loop(player, 1)
